fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attempt to bribe a player during the day. 2 Uses

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you attempt to bribe a player, they will be notified. They may choose to accept or deny the bribe. Accepting the bribe gives you their exact role. Denying the bribe has no effect.
- You have 2 extra votes you may use each day. They will only be labeled as the Elite's votes, however you may not change them after voting.
